notes: This initialization parameter is only available to the Oracle Spatial and Graph option.

property.Oracle RAC: Multiple instances should use the same value

section:
SPATIAL_VECTOR_ACCELERATION enables or disables the spatial vector acceleration. Setting this parameter to true improves spatial vector query performance.

Note:

This initialization parameter is only available to the Oracle Spatial and Graph option.

See Also:

Oracle Spatial and Graph Developer's Guide for more information about this parameter
seealso: Oracle Spatial and Graph Developer's Guide for more information about this parameter
